website_summaries.verdict: A bright, affordable, and sturdy work lamp.
pros: A powerful lamp that can be used in a reptile cage or a workshop
The aluminum reflector focuses light well and the clamp is sturdy
While not the prettiest, this 60-watt lamp can really light up a space
cons: The aluminum reflector is thin and easily bent

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a pretty good clamp light. Here's the breakdown: Pros: Very bright Long cord Easy and very sturdy switch Cons: The clamp is either weak or not sticky enough and can tend to slide from exactly where you want it Bottom Line: For the price of this, I can get over the weak clamp and if I really wanted to, I'm sure there is probably an easy fix for it. At the end of the day, if the clamp slips, just adjust the aim point of the light and you're good to go. If I need another clamp light I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: 2016Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Used this with a 60watt equivalent LED bulb to light up my 10’ X10’ vendor tent. Clipped it on in the corner & it lit up my entire tent. Inexpensive, durable, strong clip, perfect for any kind of quickie lighting situation. I bought 3 thinking it wouldn’t be bright enough and only needed one. Totally adjustable you can aim the light in any direction, the clip held securely. So glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: SoftCrochetByLoriAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor plants
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add extra light for my indoor plants, and it works perfectly. The clamp is really sturdy (was almost difficult for me to open to place on my shelf) and the lamp itself stays in place when aimed a certain direction. Overall, this is excellent quality, especially for the price. Will likely order another for my other plants soon! Would highly recommend for indoor plant lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Christy_Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great clamp lights
customer_reviews.text: Always looking around for another clamp light for the next long term project. I like the smaller 5.5 inch reflectors, as they do not get in your way like the 8.5" or larger reflectors. The reflector screws on to the plastic fixture snugly, and without any wobble that makes you think it will fall off like others I have used. I have learned to use the new LED lights in these; they use far less power, with much more light, and they run cool which is important when dealing with a plastic fixture. One more feature of LED's, is that they can take a hit and not break which happens all the time with these work lights.
customer_reviews.author: GearJunkyTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for front porch.
customer_reviews.text: This is used w/ a ceramic bulb (so no light) on the front porch for my indoor/outdoor cat. He prefers to sleep on the porch and this lamp is the perfect size to fit over his box.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: The light has resolved my issue. Bought a shed for work. It's dark in the mornings when I go to get equipment out. Clamped on the light to a 2x4 and aimed it to the back of a 32' shed and it lights it up. It did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Blinky521

customer_reviews.title: Great for temporary lighting
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for setting up lighting for Halloween decorations. I used these for CFL black lights and placed around my yard to point at my decorations. They are a good deal for the number you get. Power cord is long and useful. The switch isn't super sturdy so it wouldn't be best for heavy usage but perfect for temporary purposes. For the price, hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Wile E Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Built well and strong clamp. Using with a grow light and doing well.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's keeping some nice pond plants alive for us using an inexpensive grow light 24 hours per day after bringing some especially nice plants indoors for the winter. Now December, so hoping they last till Spring!I Very sturdy with strong clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sola Scriptura

customer_reviews.title: Deeper scoop is better protection for longer bulbs ...
customer_reviews.text: I've decided I like these four clampies more than the other four I have from another company. This is because they accommodate a longer bulb than most 5.5" reflectors. These actually protect a 24 watt LED bulb with it's added length. Others leave the end sticking out. Nonetheless, the clamps could be a bit beefier, hence the four stars. I'd give them 4.5 stars as the price was acceptable as well.
customer_reviews.author: adman

customer_reviews.title: very usuable lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this greppable lamp to hold the very bright and large Led bulbs I was ordering. I wanted to be able to move it around my dark apartment and to light up bird cages. It does exactly that and so far has stayed clipped to every thing I have attached it to. I'd order another if needed another easily movable lamp
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mattos

customer_reviews.title: To small in all way
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. Must have missed that. I don't know about others but I typically clamp these to a 2x4. This one, like many others out there, does not clamp easily to the 2x4. Bad grip and it falls. The clamp isn't designed well enough to make a tight hug. Bulbs for heat lamp etc are too big for comfort with this light.
customer_reviews.author: MarkusR

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the basement and garage!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be the exact same lamp that my local walmart is selling for $10 a pop. I use these to shoot my youtube videos. I use LED daylight bulbs in them and they do not get hot at all. the ones I have used with normal light bulbs do get warmer. I wouldn't use over a 75w bulb in it. you may be able to get away with 100w bulb if you use it for short periods of time. but i aint gonna risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Nice fixtures and they work well, but they arrived crushed due to being packed in too shallow of a box. They can be bent back in to shape but look beat up like they came from a garage sale. Not worth sending back and Amazon will only give a small credit. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: rorinsmith

customer_reviews.title: A new Alexa spotlight!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hardware to create an Alexa-enabled indoor spotlight for Christmas ornaments. Lohas Smart wi-fi flood light bulbs fitted to project a focussed beam onto my new angel tree topper. Clamp grabs and holds onto the Christmas tree easily and light socket swivels freely for optimal positioning.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. These clamp lights are being used with gro lights for my plants and seeds. And they work great! Thank you very much !!

customer_reviews.title: Grabs on tight and seems well made
customer_reviews.text: The clamp really hangs on, and the construction seems top notch. I'm not using any incandescent bulbs in the two I have, so I'm not sure how they will handle extreme heat.. but I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: I’m even happier after I got it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and as described. I’m even happier after I got it, the bell does screw on and off. Haven’t had any issues, have it holding a 28watt LED full spectrum plant bulb and it hasn’t had any heat issues with or without the bell. The clamp is nice but not too tight.

customer_reviews.title: Beat up but functional
customer_reviews.text: The light arrived with several large dents and scratches on the housing, and the socket had to be tightened in order to function, but these aren't made to look pretty. Good clamps, nice cord length. Not bad

customer_reviews.title: Works 👍

customer_reviews.title: Greats product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect buy. Had an ancient lamp previously and when it burnt out I had to make a purchase ASAP. I made the proper choice! It has a tight clamp and swivels to be adjusted to right where it is needed.

customer_reviews.title: Just be aware the the back part is made of plastic so higher power bulbs are not recommended. I made the mistake of using a 100 ...

customer_reviews.text: This is, without doubt, the most poorly and cheaply constructed lamp I've ever purchased. This clamp light arrived AFTER the Amazon Prime "guarantee" delivery date. Okay, so that's no surprise. We all know that Prime Delivery guarantees doesn't exist, but when this lamp did arrive, along with another product in the same box, it was dented, damaged and misshapen. The shade can be easily pinched between two fingers. If you want a long lasting clamp light, this is NOT the one to purchase. Would I recommend this product? Sure ... if the price were 0.50 cents or less!

product_meta.title: Simple Deluxe HIWKLTCLAMPLIGHTS Clamp Lamp Light with 5.5 Inch Aluminum Reflector up to 60 Watt E26 (no Bulb Included) 6 Feet 18/2 SPT-2 Cord, 1-Pack, Silver
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack"

Simple Deluxe Clamp lights are superior quality products, designed using the very latest technological advancements. The clamp lights have a wide variety of uses and is suitable for many environments. Our clamp light works great for studio, garages, workshops, photo studio, aquarium, art studios and more.

Feature Advantage:
Our clamp light accepts up to 60-watt bulb medium base bulb (E26/E27).
You could use with 60-watt infrared emitter lamp for Aquarium, Reptiles, Brooder Coop, Pet.
Great for indoor plants with led grow light bulbs.
Versatile multi-use utility lamps with polished and vented aluminum reflectors.
Each unit features a double; ball universal joint.

Specification:
Size: S
Quantity: 1 Pack
Volt: 120V Max
Watt: 60W
Reflector Diameter: 5.5 inch
Cord length: 6 feet

"
feature_bullets: Material: 5.5 inch aluminum reflector, 60W max phenolic plastics lamp holder (E26). Type A lamp. (Note: the temperature of the lamp holder will rise after use, do not touch it with your hands)
Function: the clip is firm and well fixed, 360° adjustment, the direction of the light can be pointed to where you need.

Application: provide light for plant seedlings, garage, water tank, tent, workbench, laundry room, can be used as bedroom reading lights, work light in photography and workshops etc. Also can be used with reptile pet bulbs.
Advantages: adjustable thumb screws can positioning the light direction you need.
Package Include: 1-pack 60W 5. 5 inch aluminum reflector clamp light (no bulb included)
